TEXT.S: pslkotas babaw kmnloh 'bagan lga, pslkotas qu qalang Tayal la. msli kuwara qu qutux niqan, qmasuw pcyuwagun, psqqas grhuw ryax. tehuk ryax lga, msqun tegalu ki mlawa Utux Wagiq ru utux bnkis, msqun mquwas ru mzyugi smqqas ki mplaw maniq. pslkotas hya ga psqutux inlungan qalang ki 'mubuy psglabang gaga Tayal.
